attributes.action: Grant Emergency #VISASforUkrainians who are Family Members of UK Citizens
attributes.additional_details:
It saddens me to the core that nothing of any impact is being done by the UK government to stop this unprovoked attack on Ukraine. People are stuck surrounded by an imminent threat of attack from all directions, with no commercial flights available to leave. It is a very scary situation.

If approved this would allow family members of British citizens to reach safety, and reach their family, by granting them access to the UK from Poland or any other country they are able to flee to.
attributes.background: This is a petition to help all those Ukrainian people in the UK, (who are either now British citizens or UK residents, and whom will have worked hard and brought value to the country), to get the British government to grant an emergency VISA allowing their family to enter the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for related actions:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Allow Ukrainians with family in the UK to enter the UK without a visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609397

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574
